mapper.insert: insert into t_content (title, img_url, video_url, content, type, view_count, comment_count, create_by, create_time, brief, category_id) values (#{title}, #{imgUrl}, #{videoUrl}, #{content}, #{type}, #{viewCount}, #{commentCount}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{brief}, #{categoryId});
mapper.select: select t2.id, title, brief, img_url, t2.type, view_count, comment_count, t2.create_time, t1.name as categoryName from t_category t1 join t_content t2 on t1.id = t2.category_id where t2.create_by = #{id} and t2.type = #{type} order by create_time DESC
select id, title, img_url, video_url, content, type, category_id from t_content where id = #{id}
